comment: The superior limit of an infinite sequence ` F ` of extended real numbers, which is the infimum of the set of suprema of all upper infinite subsequences of ` F ` . Definition 12-4.1 of [Gleason] p. 175. (Contributed by NM, 26-Oct-2005.) (Revised by AV, 12-Sep-2014.)
